name: Rogue Company: Starter Founder's Pack
description:
The mission starts now!

The Rogue Company Starter Founder's Pack grants early access to the game, two extra Rogues, and four cosmetic items to make sure you’re carrying out the mission in style. There’s no better way to gear up for battle and go Rogue!

This Bundle includes:

Immediate access to the Rogue Company Closed Beta before it becomes Free-To-Play at a later date Rare Speed Demon Ronin Outfit Epic Solar Flare Weapon Wrap Epic Superstar Dance Emote Rare Founder Spray Two Extra Playable Rogues: Phantom and Chaac
